notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.heading: We couldn't find that page
notFound.body: It seems we couldn't find that page. Please try again or contact an administrator if the problem persists.

start.heading: Please confirm your account
start.body: Hey {name}, start verifying your account! Get the maximum out of Xescrow.app. Verifying your account will allow faster processing in case of disputes.

continue.heading: Continue your account verification
continue.body: Hey {name}, you have pending verification for your account! Get the maximum out of Xescrow.app. Verifying your account will allow faster processing in case of disputes.

review.heading: Review your documents
review.body: Hey {name}, you have pending documents! Get the maximum out of Xescrow.app. Verifying your account will allow faster processing in case of disputes.

identityStatement.title: Identity Statement
identityStatement.subtitle: The identity statement is a document confirming your verification status and includes your personal information such as name and address.

password.subtitle: Never share your password with anyone

trustDevices.subtitle: These devices will not require 2-factor authentication

sessions.title: Review last sessions
sessions.subtitle: If you find any suspicious devices or locations, block them
sessions.recognize: I don't recognize some login attempts
sessions.info: If you don’t recognize any login attempts, locations, or devices, make sure to change your password and check if you're not using proxies. If unrecognized sessions keep appearing, please contact us.

contacts.subtitle: Update your personal data, anytime before the next mandatory update
